What's the aspect ratio of this?  Is it proper widescreen?  Cos every rip I've grabbed so far has been either small screen or semi-wide screen.  And I noticed whenever someone ups a smallscreen version, they don't tell anyone (presumably cos they know no one would be interested if they knew).
(When I said 'every rip' I meant every Evil Dead rip).
